detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke, mesh at the top, and lace trim around the sleeves.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket.in a straight-cut, gently tapered fit. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups, a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps, and an adjustable metal hook fastening.
Suede boots with a zip at the back, faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.

Padded bras in soft cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Metal hair clips.
Cotton terry bath towel with a hood that has ears sewn on top and an embroidered motif on the front. Size 70x70 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.
Short dress in patterned poplin with a collar and chunky zip at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Bag in patterned mesh with trims, two handles and a zip at the top. Size 13x34x44 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a large flounce at the top and cups with removable inserts.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
One-shoulder body in lace. Double layer at the top with lightly padded cups and removable inserts, a lined gusset and a string back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front. Funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Leggings with soft elastication at the waist and extra room for a growing tummy.

Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 5.5 cm.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and on the shoulder straps, and a small bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with double-layered flounces, the lower layer with an embroidered flower pattern and the top layer with a pompom trim. High waist with wide smocking.
Fabric belt with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Jumper in double-layered, fine knit cotton with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves, a roll-edge neckline and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Fitted V-neck dress in stretch cotton jersey with short sleeves, a gathered seam at one side and an asymmetric hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and ribbed hems.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long, slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Wide blouse in airy cotton poplin with buttons down the front and a small stand-up collar with a small frill trim and narrow ties at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a double layer at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Chinos in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

One-shoulder, ankle-length dress in a patterned viscose weave. One open shoulder and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the other shoulder. Concealed zip in one side, narrow smocking at the waist and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, buttons at the sides, front and back pockets and a fake fly.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Jumper in a soft knit with a longer, rounded layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
Fitted, one-shoulder body in soft jersey with press-studs at the crotch and one long sleeve.
Leather slingbacks with pointed toes and an elasticated strap around the heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered kitten heels 5.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in jacquard-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, and buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Set with a sleeveless top, leggings and hairband in cotton. A-line top in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered flounce at the hem. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in patterned jersey with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style T-shirt in jersey made from an airy linen and viscose blend with a round neck.
Sun hat in cotton poplin. Width of brim 5 cm. Lined.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a straight-cut hem. For the matching child’s T-shirt, look for 0721929.
Tops in cotton jersey with wide, printed shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a rib knit with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied in a drawstring fabric bag.
Suede slip-on trainers with a lightly padded top edge and elastic gores in the sides. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
